__TOC__

== Activities on October 2011 ==

* October 3rd: Meeting for Egypt LoCo team members to brainstorm on the upcoming Release Party and methods to establish localized Ubuntu Global Events in Arabic(<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/EgyptTeam/Meetings/Agendas/2011-10-03|Agenda]]</nowiki>).
* October 15th: Ubuntu-Eg participation at <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/EgyptTeam/Events/2011-10-15-Ubuntu-EG_Participation-at-OSDay-in-Mansourah|Open Source Day in Mansourah]]</nowiki>.
* October 19, 20th: Partnership and team members existence <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/EgyptTeam/Events/2011-10-%2819-20%29-ArabNet-Cairo|during the conference]]</nowiki>.
* October 22nd: <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/EgyptTeam/Events/2011-10-22-CUFE-Ubuntu_11.10-Release-Party|LoCo's Release Party at Cairo University]]</nowiki>.
* October 23rd: Ubuntu-EG Media-Partnered with noZom, in delivering the biggest event in Nile Delta, The <nowiki>[[http://www.nozom.org/rowad|Rowad Conference]]</nowiki>.
